Summary: PI3K (PIK3C2A, PIK3C2B) activates AKT (AKT1, AKT2, AKT3).
ALK-EML4 (ALK, EML4) activates Ras (HRAS, KRAS, NRAS).
ALK-NPM1 (ALK, NPM1) activates Stat3/5 (STAT3, STAT5A, STAT5B).
Raf (ARAF, BRAF, RAF1) activates MEK (MAP2K1, MAP2K2).
Ras (HRAS, KRAS, NRAS) activates Raf (ARAF, BRAF, RAF1).
Biochemical reaction from crizotinib to crizotinib M10. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A5, AOX1 or CYP3A4.
Transport from crizotinib to crizotinib. This interaction is catalyzed by ABCB1.
Transport from crizotinib to crizotinib. This interaction can be catalyzed by SLCO1B1 or SLCO1B3.
